name: Presentationkaraoke
tagline: Grab 6-200 of your closest friends and present random topics to the worst and most random slides ever created. Fun, and you just might learn something.
body:
# Presentation Karaoke

Grab 6-200 of your closest friends and present random topics to the worst and most random slides ever created. Fun, and you just might learn something.

Download the App from the Windows App Store. Then play any deck. We've got one here for you to start with. I'll upload it in a bit.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
